job.title: Servicenow Developer
job.description: pstrongRole ServiceNow DeveloperstrongppstrongLocation 100 RemotestrongppstrongContract Duration 6 MonthsstrongppbrppstrongRequirementsstrongpulliExperienced ServiceNow developersliliAbility to create complex workflows using flow designerliliAbility to create forms with automation fulfillmentliliStrong knowledge and understanding of ServiceNow data model and tables especially for incident change and CMDBliliKnowledge of SN APIsliliNetwork server or INF knowledge and experience is a plus but not requiredliulpbrppstrongResponsibilitiesstrongpulliReplace work order templates using flow designerliliDevelop forms including documentationliliConsult and help in development of the appropriate rest API to replace the 100 automations across FI that use BMC ticket APIliliConsult other citizen developers with guardrails and solutionsliulpp
